Name: Forgotten Journey
About the game: “Forgotten Journey” is a puzzle-oriented platformer, where the player will follow a linear path jumping, climbing, and solving puzzles with the help of an AI companion that will follow her. After making a silly mistake while doing some reparations, Mainkah opens an interstellar gate and gets herself transported to an unknown world, which she will need to explore to find her way out of there. Features Puzzle solving Scenic Landscapes Languages: English, Spanish, Basque About Development Forgotten Journey is a project developed by Asvaq Games , a team of 4th Year students at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao ( ) in a 9-month development cycle using Unreal Engine 4.
